title: ARC FLASH
fullText:
All battery system types categorized as having an arc flash hazard above "minor" (see Table 6.1) shall carry a warning sign to indicate the dangers of arc flash. This sign shall be mounted either adjacent to the enclosure or on all doors to the room where the battery system is located.
Work health and safety (WHS) regulations may require signs indicating the need for personal protective equipment (PPE).
